subject: [Radiance-general] photo sensor , electrical ligh
body:
hi everybody
i have a question about electric light analysis in radiance. is it possible
to use dimmers or photosensors in this kind of analysis? what are the
parameters we you should use for this purpose. thank you in advance
Sincerely
